name: Everyday Hero Widget
author: Adrian Ciaschetti

sections.description:
Display your Everyday Hero profile beautifully on your website with this widget.

Features

  • Beautiful design
  • Very simple and easy to use
  • Just copy your profile URL and the widget manages everything else
  • Performance optimised to ensure fast loading times

What is Everyday Hero?

everydayhero is a service that aims to re-define the modern giving experience. While many existing services allow people to raise and donate money to causes, everydayhero enables fundraising and volunteering whilst also providing a visual representation of the time, effort, and social engagement that goes into supporting a cause. Supporters can select a charity, start fundraising or volunteering, and begin tracking their Giving Footprint.

Where can I get support

Any questions or support requests will be answered on wordpress.org.
This is an unofficial plugin for Everyday Hero.

Credits

  • Adrian Ciaschetti
  • Yoghurt Digital
  • everydayhero

If you like this plugin, please rate it
sections.installation:
Installation

  1. Upload everyday-hero-widget to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Appearance > Widgets and drag Everyday Hero to your sidebar
  4. Fill in the settings: your Everyday Hero profile url, and the option to show the Everyday Hero logo

Requirements

  • PHP 5.2.0 or later
  • WordPress 4.0 or later
